Production Co: The Jolly Cow, Castelao Producciones S.A., Videntia Frames Producciones S.L., Monfort Producciones S.L., Divine Productions
Synopsis: Two couples (Gary Oldman, Virginie Ledoyen, Paddy Considine) must get a feral girl (Yaiza Esteve) to safety after the men find her in the woods.
Title: The Backwoods
